moonay.gui.player_info.tooltip.critchanc: Indicates the likelihood of landing a 'Critical Hit.
moonay.gui.player_info.tooltip.critdamag: Represents the additional damage dealt with a 'Critical Hit'
moonay.gui.player_info.tooltip.damagered: The percentage of incoming damage that is negated.
enchantment.moonay.carve.desc: Everytime attack target it gonna decrease protection amount,when attack for a while can rightclick to heal
enchantment.moonay.stigma.desc: Can execute if target have low health and heal player,can rightclick to heal and deal damage aroud user
enchantment.moonay.deci_experiment.desc: If C. Chance is over 100% foreach 10% -> 1% + lvl C.Damage
